I did want to add this comment in a different thread, because I do
welcome any feed back I receive. 

I have had some enlightening information from Azure warrior which is
very helpful, but I am interested in any thoughts people have for the
Unicronians. 

How does everyone perceive them and goals? Anything that they would
like to see? I see them as the uber faction and individually very
powerful. They are hated and feared by all .. or at least most, and are
collectively powerful enough to hold their own against the forces
arrayed against them. 

What is everyone else's thoughts?

Preston
(Da'minion)
